channel.title: Comments on: ThemeMix Pro for Genesis
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/thememix-pro-for-genesis/#comment-475">Remkus de Vries</a>.
Hey Remkus, thanks for sharing this!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Remkus de Vries.

Hey Remkus, thanks for sharing this!

item.title: By: Remkus de Vries
item.dc:creator: Remkus de Vries
item.description: Wanted to add this for the description, but 60 characters really was too short for this one: A plugin that adds page templates, plugin compatibility and a Featured Content Widget with BuddyPress integration to the Genesis Framework. No bloat, only loading what is necessary to make Genesis play nice.
item.content:encoded:
Wanted to add this for the description, but 60 characters really was too short for this one:
A plugin that adds page templates, plugin compatibility and a Featured Content Widget with BuddyPress integration to the Genesis Framework.
No bloat, only loading what is necessary to make Genesis play nice.
